tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  full_name VARCHAR(100),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  address VARCHAR(150),
  biometric_data BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  full_name VARCHAR(100),
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
  biometric_data BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE account_information (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  account_status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'active',
  balance DECIMAL(10, 2) DEFAULT 0.00
);
CREATE TABLE users ( user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL, password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE profiles ( profile_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id), full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, dob DATE NOT NULL, gender VARCHAR(10), address VARCHAR(255) );
CREATE TABLE biometric_data ( biometric_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id), fingerprint_data BYTEA NOT NULL, face_data BYTEA NOT NULL, voice_data BYTEA NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE account_info ( account_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id), account_number VARCHAR(20) UNIQUE NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, last_transaction TIMESTAMP );

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    bio_data BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    profile_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    birthdate DATE,
    address VARCHAR(255),
    CONSTRAINT fk_user_id FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE account_info (
    account_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    balance DECIMAL(10, 2) DEFAULT 0.00,
    CONSTRAINT fk_user_id FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE biometric_data (
    data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    fingerprint_data BYTEA,
    eye_scan_data BYTEA,
    face_recognition_data BYTEA,
    CONSTRAINT fk_user_id FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE access_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    login_time TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    logout_time TIMESTAMP,
    CONSTRAINT fk_user_id FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);
